column3:
When you are at it, can you please document "softforks" (from #6353) in the doc/REST-interface.md file?

Please also add "pruned" and "pruneheight" into helptext here https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/rpcblockchain.cpp#L597 to make it complete.
@paveljanik I've included the extra documentation. should `doc/REST-interface.md` go into the array contents of `softforks`? As I have only include the upper most level.\n
